org.jooby.assets

Class Rjs

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jooby.assets.AssetOptions
      • org.jooby.assets.AssetProcessor
        • org.jooby.assets.Rjs

  • public class Rjs
extends AssetProcessor

    rjs

    require.js optimizer resolve and optimize require.js files.

    usage

     assets {
   fileset {
     home: js/home.js
   }

   pipeline {
     dev: [rjs]
     dist: [rjs]
   }
 }

    NOTE: The fileset have to define the main module (root/main entry point) and require.js will do all the work.

    options

     assets {
   ...
   rjs {
     optimize: none
     ...
   }
 }
    Since:
    0.11.0
    Author:
    edgar
